text: Henry Ruiz is Nicaraguan politician. He is a former guerilla and one of the nine commandants of the Sandinista (FSLN) government following the 1979 overthrow of the Somoza regime. He later left the FSLN, joining Sergio Ramírez and Dora María Tellez to lead the Sandinista Renovation Movement (MRS). ==References== Category:Living people Category:Sandinista Renovation Movement politicians Category:Sandinista National Liberation Front politicians Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Henry Ruiz
